text: Va pas az onon conisinon [-i nosoista]-e omadand, ki kitoʙ [Tavrot]-ro ʙa irs ʙurdand. Onon [sarvatu] koloi in [dunjoi] pastro megirand, [ki suxanoni Alloh taoloro tahrifu ʙa nohaq hukm kunand] va megujand: «Baxsida xohem sud». Va agar kolo [-i digar]-e hammonandi on ʙarojason ʙiojad, onro [niz] megirand. Ojo dar kitoʙ [-i osmoni] az onon pajmon girifta nasudaast, ki dar ʙorai Alloh taolo cuz [suxani] haq nagujand? [Pas, nofarmonijason az ruji nodoni nest, zero ʙorho Tavrotro xondaand] Va onciro, ki dar on ast, omuxtaand va saroi oxirat ʙaroi kasone, ki parvo kunand, ʙehtar ast. Ojo nameandesed
